summary: Goal Driven Women with a love for the elderly population.  Dedicated to helping others through my time, Talents, Gifts, and Presence.

currentPositions.description: The Life Enrichment Connections Coordinator ( LECC) plans, organizes, and directs the overall operation of the Personal Care Activity program following current federal, state, local, and facility standards, guidelines, and regulations, as may be directed by the Personal Care Administrator or Wellness Manager.  They will also assist the Life Enrichment/Wellness Manager in providing, planning, and creating activities of interest for Independent Living
currentPositions.title: Life Enrichment Connections Coordinator

headline: Life Enrichment Connections Coordinator at Laurel View Village

certifications.name: Cerified Demetia Practitioner

organizations.name: National Association of Activity Professionald
organizations.description: NAAP only represents Activity Professionals working in primarily geriatric settings. We are activity professionals providing opportunities for professional development and personal growth for activity professionals.

organizations.name: Pennsylvania Association of Activity Professionals
organizations.description:
PAPA’s goals are to:

Promote quality or service with an emphasis on the geriatric population.

Increase public awareness and advocate for our profession and quality of life for the elderly on the state and national level.

Offer and promote educational opportunities for members to meet the ongoing challenges of activity services.

Foster the exchange of ideas, resources, knowledge and share experience throughout the organization.

message.text: Good Luck to this Amazing student who will take their  National Exam for Activity Director Certification.   I am so proud of you all.  *We missed you, Lindsay!

A new class for Activity Professional Certification has been scheduled, and one Bridge to ADC Course is now open for enrollment. (NOTE: you must take the APC Class and Have 2 years of experience in the field to take the ADC Course)  Please visit my link to view the classes I am offering for the remainder of 2024. https://lnkd.in/eWvuj_J9

The registration for NCCAP's Standardized Curriculum, which is essential for obtaining certification, is now open. Make sure to take advantage of this professional opportunity by visiting https://lnkd.in/gduRF9YJ.

Only a few Spots left in the Activity Professional Certification Course coming up.  
The Activity Professional Certification (APC) provides the knowledge and skills to deliver life-enriching activities that meet the highest standard of CMS. Our 8 Module Program covers:
1. Therapeutic Activity Concepts
2. Standards, Regulations & Survey
3. Communication Strategies
4. Aging Through the Lifespan
5. Cognitive and Behavioral Health
6. Documentation Skills
7. Person-Centered Engagement
8. Professional Growth and Self-Care
The course Fee for APC is only $650
Includes Coursebook and initial 2 years certification. Class work, practicum, and final exam result in Activity Professional Certified (APC)
Only a few openings left for the next step in changing your life!
You are one click away from starting your journey.
Only A few Spots left in My class Beginning on May 28.  Sign up today!

Time is almost up to register for The Bridge to ADC course. The Bridge to Activity Director Certification (ADC) is taken after completing your Activity Professional Certification(APC) or Mepap 1 Class. Activity Director Certification ensures that an individual has the knowledge and skills to lead and direct an activities and life enrichment department, including leadership, management, advocacy, care planning, and documentation. Are you ready to continue your journey? Please register for one of my Bridge to ADC Classes.  If you have not started the journey, I also offer Activity Professional Certification Courses through NCCAP. Go to https://lnkd.in/eWvuj_J9 Why not Cross that bridge?

Congratulations to the 20 students who just completed their Standardized Course For Activity Professional Certification through NATIONAL CERTIFICATION COUNCIL FOR ACTIVITY PROFESSIONALS. May you continue your growth journey in the Activity Profession and use the knowledge you gained to provide for the people you care for each day!  Great job everyone!

commentary.text: My sons school has a class on Ai.  He is taking it next year!  I cant wait to see what he learns.

My Son has been practically raised in a nursing home.  On the 3rd day of his life, he was held for hours by a man with dementia.  This man sat calmly for the first time for a significant length of time with my little boy.  Now, at 15, he volunteers regularly, and I am grateful that he realizes the importance of the many generations that he can learn and grow from.   #oldpeoplearecool
